description: This file defines an interface class 'IEventHandler' with several pure virtual methods meant for handling various events related to runtime, window, ripple, and state changes within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface class for handling different event callbacks within the WPEFramework plugin architecture.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles runtime manager related events with the given JSON data.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles window manager related events with the given JSON data.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handles ripple events identified by a name and associated JSON data.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handles state change events with the provided JSON data.
